name: leap-new
title: Leap.new
description: Generate production-ready fullstack apps with leap.new AI platform
author: andoutenc

commands.name: generate-app
commands.title: Generate App
commands.subtitle: leap.new
commands.description: Generate a fullstack app with leap.new

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Menu Bar
commands.subtitle: leap.new
commands.description: Quick access to leap.new from menu bar

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
